thread.title: Nasdaq’s New CEO Adena Friedman Has a Big Job: Reimagining the Stock Exchange
thread.title_full: Nasdaq’s New CEO Adena Friedman Has a Big Job: Reimagining the Stock Exchange - WSJ

author: Alexander Osipovich
title: Nasdaq’s New CEO Adena Friedman Has a Big Job: Reimagining the Stock Exchange
text:
When Nasdaq Inc. named Adena Friedman as its next chief executive in November, she won attention for being young, tech-savvy and the first woman to lead a major U.S. stock-exchange operator. Now, the hard part has begun.
Ms. Friedman, a 47-year-old black belt in taekwondo, has inherited a company whose traditional core business of U.S. equities trading has gotten much tougher since the heady 1990s when Nasdaq touted itself as “the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
